summary: WE HAD JUST PURCHASED A DODGE RAM 1500 ON MARCH 29. 2003 WHEN THE NEXT DAY IT DIED ON US. WE HAD IT TOWED TO THE NEAREST DEALER SHIP. AT THAT TIME THEY SAID IT HAD TO WITH THE SENSOR THEN LATER ON A FEW DAYS LATER THEY CALLED BACK AND SAID THAT IT WAS ALSO THE MODULE THAT WAS DEFECTED WITH THE SENSOR. TOLD IT WAS FIXED AFTER THEY HAD ORDER THOSE PARTS. (THIS IS ONLY FIRST TIME TRUCK DIED).   *NLM
